bibl.title: Towards Plato in Context: A Papyrus Containing Phaedo 99a-100b from CS 190 (B 224?) at Karanis.
bibl.note: Karanis, Late II/III cent. A.C. "The papyrus presented here is especially noteworthy because (1) its text includes deviations from the received text which in both character and frequency go well beyond what one normally sees in papyri; (2) its palaeographical characteristics make it stand out among literary papyri; (3) it has an excavated context."
RENNER Timothy, Towards Plato in Context: A Papyrus Containing Phaedo 99a-100b from CS 190 (B 224?) at Karanis.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 827-834 et pl. XIX.
